scriptName: SkirmishAI/Build Control/Consider all enemies when deciding what to build
scriptDesc: : Considers all enemies' units when deciding what the best or worst unit to build is.
scriptArg: AI considers the units owned by the all its enemies equally when evaluating BEST_UNIT_EXPECTED, BEST_UNIT_WEIGHTED, WORST_UNIT, FACTORY, and base defense build heuristics. This is the default behavior.
scriptTrans: 在决定建造什么时考虑所有的敌人

scriptName: SkirmishAI/Build Control/Consider specific enemy when deciding what to build
scriptDesc: 's units when deciding what the best or worst unit to build is.
scriptArg: AI considers the units owned by the given enemy when evaluating BEST_UNIT_EXPECTED, BEST_UNIT_WEIGHTED, WORST_UNIT, FACTORY, and base defense build heuristics. This enemy's units will be weighed the same as those of all the other enemies the AI has been told to consider. By default, the AI considers all enemies, so this is only useful after telling the AI to not consider all the enemies.
scriptTrans: 在决定造什么东西的时候要考虑特定的敌人

scriptName: SkirmishAI/Build Control/Don't consider any enemies when deciding what to build
scriptDesc: : Do not consider any enemies' units when deciding what the best or worst unit to build is.
scriptArg: AI does not consider the units owned by the any its enemies when evaluating BEST_UNIT_EXPECTED, BEST_UNIT_WEIGHTED, WORST_UNIT, FACTORY, and base defense build heuristics. Without some enemy units to consider, the AI will have no idea what to build, and will just build randomly. It is expected that you will call 'Consider specific enemy when deciding what to build' after this to give the AI something to build against.
scriptTrans: 在决定建造什么东西时不要考虑任何敌人

scriptName: SkirmishAI/Build Control/Don't consider specific enemy when deciding what to build
